title: Ben Reynolds (rugby league, born 1994)
text:
Ben Reynolds (born 15 January 1994) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a <a href="Goal%20%28sports%29%23Rugby%20football">goal</a>-kicking or for the <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a>.
Background.
Reynolds was born in <a href="Wakefield">Wakefield</a>, <a href="West%20Yorkshire">West Yorkshire</a>, England.
Career.
Reynolds has previously played for the <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Castleford%20Tigers%20players">Heritage № 941</a>) in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>, making his début in 2013. He spent most of the 2014 season on a dual registration contract with the <a href="York%20City%20Knights">York City Knights</a> and was named Championship One Young Player of the Year at the end of the season.
Leigh Centurions.
In October 2014, Reynolds signed a contract with the <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a> for the 2015 season, with the <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> having the first option to re-sign him for the 2016 season. He has spent time on loan at <a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster</a> and the <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a>.
Toulouse Olympique.
On 10 August 2020 it was announced that Reynolds would join <a href="Toulouse%20Olympique">Toulouse Olympique</a> for the 2021 season.
Leigh Centurions (re-join).
On 1 Apr 2021 it was reported that he had signed for the <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>.
